alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 10:17AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Significantly Reduced Visibility Due To Areas of Blowing Snow Expected Through This Afternoon... Northwest winds gusting up to 40 mph combined with light snow from early this morning and deeper lingering snowpack are resulting in areas of blowing snow. Visibilities of less than one mile are being reported. Brief whiteout conditions are possible. Visibility should begin to improve mid to late afternoon as winds slowly weaken. If traveling through parts of southern or southwest Minnesota today, be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility and slick conditions. Avoid distractions while driving and allow for extra travel time to reach your destination.
